docblock.description: This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Represents an data archive which contains different items.
Contents of the archive.
Identifier of the archive.
Flag which declares if the archive has changed.
docblock.long-description: This is set to TRUE, when an entry is added to or removed from the archive.

docblock.description: Constructor of the class.
docblock.long-description:
Needs an archive identifier, which is used to uniquely identify any archive.

The archive is loaded in the constructor. The loading takes place in the subclasses, which implement the two abstract methods.

Throws an exception, if the identifier is empty or not a string.

docblock.description: Loads the archive.
Saves the archive.
Add an entry to the archive.
docblock.long-description: The entry is checked against duplicates.

docblock.description: Remove an element from the archive.
Check if the archive already contains an specified element.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if the element is already in the archive.

docblock.description: Remove every element in the archive.
docblock.long-description: The archive will be empty after that.

docblock.description: Returns the number of entries in the archive.
This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Implements an archive which is stored in the local filesystem.
docblock.long-description: The archive identifier is stripped from any non-latin char and used as the file name.

docblock.description: Path to the file, which contains the archive.
docblock.long-description: Is filled in the buildFilename() method.

docblock.description: {@inheritdoc}

tag.name: param
tag.description: Directory in which the archive files are stored.

docblock.description: Generates the filename from the archive identifier.
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the given directory is not writeable.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Directory, in which the archive file is stored.

docblock.description: {@inheritdoc}
docblock.long-description: If the archive file does not exist, it will be automatically created.

docblock.description: {@inheritdoc}
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the file could not be written.

docblock.description: This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Main class for filtering duplicated entries in RSS / ATOM feeds.
docblock.long-description: The feed is loaded from the remote server and the XML parsed by PHP's DOMDocument class. Then every feed entry is checked against an archive to detect, if the feed entry was already seen. If this is true, the entry would be removed from the feed. After every entry is checked, the possibly altered feed XML is build again and sent to the client.

docblock.description: URL of the original feed.
Instance of the used archive.
Instance of the HTTP client.
Instance of the manipulator used to alter the feed.
List of feed manipulators which should be probed and used to manipulate the feed.
docblock.long-description: This array is ordered, which means the first entry will be used first.

docblock.description: Instance of the used identifier.
Constructor of the class.
docblock.long-description:
Needs the URL of the feed.

Throws an exception if the feed URL is invalid.

tag.name: param
tag.description: URL to the feed which should be filtered.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Instance of an archive which implements ArchiveBase.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Instance of an identifier which implements IIdentifier.

docblock.description: Saves the archive back to its storage medium.
Tries to detect the appropriate feed manipulator which can handle the downloaded feed, depending on the type of the feed.
docblock.long-description:
Every class name in the $manipulatorClasses array will be instantiated and probed if it supports the feed type.

If the XML of the feed could not be parsed properly an exception with more information about the cause will be thrown.

docblock.description: Retrieve the feed from the remote server.
docblock.long-description: If the feed could not be downloaded an exception will be thrown with information about the cause.

docblock.description: Filter out duplicated items in the feed.
docblock.long-description:
If the feed is sent to the client, the same Content-Type header field as the original feed had is set so the MIME type (and encoding) the remote server used isn't lost.

If the feed is not sent to the client, the resulting array contains the feed in the 'output' element and the header fields in the 'header' element.

tag.name: param
tag.description: TRUE if the feed is sent to the client.

docblock.description: Generate an unique identifier from the feed item.
docblock.long-description:
The data from the IIdentifier-implementing class is used as data source. The SHA1 hash function is calculated from this data.

Throws a RuntimeException, when the used identifier class is not capable of generating an identifier from this feed. This can happen, e.g. when the feed entry has no date element and the DateIdentifier is used.

Represents an feed item in ATOM format.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}

Represents a class for manipulating XML feeds in ATOM format.
{@inheritdoc}
{@inheritdoc}
This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Respresents a single entry of an feed.
Title of the entry.
docblock.long-description: NULL if not available.

docblock.description: Description of the entry.
docblock.long-description: NULL if not available.

docblock.description: Date of the entry.
docblock.long-description: NULL if not available.

docblock.description: Link of the entry.
docblock.long-description: NULL if not available.

docblock.description: ID of the entry.
docblock.long-description: NULL if not available.

docblock.description: Corresponding XML element.
Constructor of the class.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Corresponding XML element containing the feed entry.

docblock.description: Parses the XML of the feed entry.
docblock.long-description: In this function the public fields are filled.

docblock.description: Returns the first child XML element or NULL if not found.
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the tag name is empty or not a string.

docblock.description: Returns the value of first child XML element or NULL if not found.
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the tag name is empty or not a string.

docblock.description: Returns the attribute value of the first child XML element or NULL if not found.
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the tag or attribute name is empty or not a string.

docblock.description: Human representation of this instance.
This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Represents a class for manipulating XML feeds.
The DOM structure of the feed.
The entries of the feed.
Contains the last error message, if errors occurred during loading of the feed.
docblock.long-description: If no errors occurred, FALSE is returned.

docblock.description: Constructor of the class.
Error handler when loading the feed XML.
docblock.long-description: This handler is set and unset in loadFeed() to catch errors which occurred during parsing of the XML document in DOMDocument. The error message is extracted from the error string by using an regular expression and stored in the loadingError() field.

docblock.description: Parses the raw XML feed.
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the feed is empty or not a string.

docblock.description: Returns the finished XML feed.
Removes an entry from the feed.
Returns if this feed manipulator is capable of manipulating the given feed.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if this instance support the type of feed.

docblock.description: Parses the feed to extract all feed entries.
Returns an Iterator instance for iterating the feed entries.
docblock.long-description: Do not call offsetUnset(). Use removeItem() instead.

docblock.description: Returns the number of feed entries.
This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Represents an feed item in RSS 0.90 / 0.91 / 0.92 format.
docblock.long-description: This class inherits the class for RSS 1.0, since the XML elements used are the same.

This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
A simple HTTP client.
The HTTP status code of the last request.
The 'Content-Type' header of the last request.
The response of the last request.
Issues an GET request to the specified URL.
docblock.long-description: Throws an exception if the URL is empty.

docblock.description: Parses the needed entries from the response header.
docblock.long-description: Needs the contents of the predefined $http_response_header variable.

docblock.description: Uses an regular expression to search for the correct value in the header array.

tag.name: param
tag.description: &$destination Variable to save the value in (call by reference)

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if pattern matched and group content saved in destination

docblock.description: This file is part of the FeedDupeFilter project.
Defines an interface for returning an unique identifier of an feed item.
Returns an identifier which is unique among the other feed entries or NULL, if the feed is not incompatible.
docblock.long-description: The feed is incompatible to this identifier, if the feed specification does not have that element the identifier uses. This is also the case, if the feed is just not conform to the feed specification.
